intro: Berniera, commonly known as the desert holly, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Geraniaceae. These plants are native to the arid and semi-arid regions of the western United States and northern Mexico. Berniera species are often used in xeriscaping due to their drought tolerance and ornamental value.
